scenario_text.value: You did it! You won!
And wait, were you actually talking?!
Ryo...! I too have learned to speak at last.

No kidding... *sniff*...! Look at that. Now
I’m crying for some reason. Heheh.

That’s my line... I’m so happy I could burst
into tears!

You called me your best friend... I couldn’t
ask for anything more! *sniff*

Heh, heheh... Knock it off, you’re
embarrassing me!

You did so well out there... I couldn’t be
happier, Kunemon!

You’ve got that wrong, Ryo. I’m not Kunemon
anymore...

My name is JewelBeemon! Pleased to formally
make your acquaintance!

JewelBeemon, huh? All right, then. But let’s
keep on working together.
Heyyy, Ryo!

Oh, it’s Takuma! Okay... Now that you can
speak, we’re gonna brag like hell!
Yooo, Takuma!
Ryo! You’re okay!

Of course I’m okay! But never mind that,
check this out!

Kunemon evolved, and he can finally talk
now!
For real?! That’s amazing!
Yeah! Crazy, ain’t it?
Hey, JewelBeemon! Get over here!
Kew, kew...
WHAT?! You changed back!
Kewkew...

Tired, huh? B-but wait, just show Takuma how
you can talk now, will ya? Huh?
Kewww...

Aw man.. Well, you can just show me next time
he evolves, right?

Hey, hold up! How the heck’m I supposed to
make that happen in the first place?!

You gotta be kiddin’ me... Why’s it gotta be
like this?!
